articles.title: Actress Anne Heche dies after car crash - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Hollywood actress, who had been in a coma with a severe brain injury since the fiery car crash on August 5, has been declared legally dead.
articles.content: Heche, best known for 1990s movies Donnie Brasco and Six Days, Seven Nights as well as a high-profile relationship with talk show host Ellen DeGeneres, crashed her car into a two-storey house in the … [+1108 chars]

articles.author: Mert Erdemir
articles.title: Novel AI algorithm may be the key for a breakthrough epilepsy treatment - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: A group of scientists from the University College London developed an artificial intelligence algorithm that can detect drug-resistant focal cortical dysplasia.
articles.content: FCDs are areas of the brain that have evolved abnormally and therefore cause drug-resistant epilepsy. Generally, its treatment requires surgery. But it's challenging to spot these lesions via MRI sin… [+1439 chars]
